articles.title: Octopus-inspired ‘synthetic skin’ changes colour and texture on demand - Nature
articles.description: A material that can switch its appearance, cephalopod-style, could have future applications in robotics or display technology.
articles.content:
The new materials are inspired by the colour-changing, shape-shifting properties of octopus skin. Credit: Ethan Daniels/Alamy
